languages.text:
В одной из колоний протектората произошло важное событие — ситуация требует личного внимания Вольного Торговца.
Вы можете посетить колонию и выполнить событие в любое время. Информацию о событиях, требующих вашего участия, можно найти в меню колоний [{bind|OpenColonyManagement}].

An important event has occurred in one of your protectorate's colonies which calls for the Rogue Trader's personal attention.
You can visit the colony and complete the event at any time. You can find out more information about all current events demanding your involvement on the colony management screen [{bind|OpenColonyManagement}].
languages.original_text:
В одной из колоний протектората произошло важное событие — ситуация требует личного внимания Вольного Торговца.
Вы можете посетить колонию и выполнить событие в любое время. Информацию о событиях, требующих вашего участия, можно найти в меню колоний [{bind|OpenColonyManagement}].

traits.locale_text:
An important event has occurred in one of your protectorate's colonies which calls for the Rogue Trader's personal attention.
You can visit the colony and complete the event at any time. You can find information about all current events demanding your involvement on the colony management screen [{bind|OpenColonyManagement}].

You can visit the colony and complete the event at any time. You can find out more information about all current events demanding your involvement on the colony management screen [{bind|OpenColonyManagement}].

languages.text:
您的王朝殖民地发生了重大事件，需要您亲自处理。
您可以随时造访殖民地，完成重大事件。您可以按下[{bind|OpenColonyManagement}]，从殖民地管理界面中找到相关事件的详细信息。
languages.original_text:
An important event has occurred in one of your protectorate's colonies which calls for the Rogue Trader's personal attention.
You can visit the colony and complete the event at any time. You can find out more information about all current events demanding your involvement on the colony management screen [{bind|OpenColonyManagement}].

traits.locale_text:
您的王朝殖民地发生了重大事件，需要您亲自处理。
您可以随时造访殖民地，完成重大事件。您可以按下[{bind|OpenColonyManagement}]，从殖民地管理界面中找到相关事件的详细信息。

languages.text:
保護国家のコロニーのひとつで、自由開拓者の助けが必要な重要なイベントが始まった。
好きな時にコロニーを訪れ、イベントをクリアしよう。コロニー管理画面では、参加を要請される現在進行中のすべてのイベントに関する情報を見ることができる[{bind|OpenColonyManagement}]。
languages.original_text:
An important event has occurred in one of your protectorate's colonies which calls for the Rogue Trader's personal attention.
You can visit the colony and complete the event at any time. You can find out more information about all current events demanding your involvement on the colony management screen [{bind|OpenColonyManagement}].

traits.locale_text:
保護国家のコロニーのひとつで、ローグトレーダーの助けが必要な重要なイベントが始まった。
いつでもコロニーを訪れ、イベントを完了することができる。コロニー管理画面では、参加を要請される現在進行中のすべてのイベントに関する情報を見つけることができる[{bind|OpenColonyManagement}]。

languages.text:
Se ha producido un suceso importante en una de las colonias de tu protectorado que requiere la atención personal de tu Comerciante Independiente.
Puedes visitar la colonia y completar el evento cuando quieras. Puedes consultar más información sobre los eventos actuales que exigen tu atención en la pantalla de gestión de colonias [{bind|OpenColonyManagement}].
languages.original_text:
An important event has occurred in one of your protectorate's colonies which calls for the Rogue Trader's personal attention.
You can visit the colony and complete the event at any time. You can find out more information about all current events demanding your involvement on the colony management screen [{bind|OpenColonyManagement}].

traits.locale_text:
Se ha producido un suceso importante en una de las colonias de tu protectorado que requiere la atención personal de tu Comerciante Independiente.
Puedes visitar la colonia y completar el evento cuando quieras. Puedes consultar más información sobre los eventos actuales que exigen tu atención en la pantalla de gestión de colonias [{bind|OpenColonyManagement}].

languages.text:
In einer der Kolonien deines Protektorats ist ein wichtiges Ereignis eingetreten, das die persönliche Aufmerksamkeit des Freihändlers erfordert.
Du kannst die Kolonie jederzeit besuchen und das Ereignis abschließen. Weitere Informationen zu allen aktuellen Ereignissen, die deine Beteiligung erfordern, findest du im Kolonieverwaltungsbildschirm [{bind|OpenColonyManagement}].
languages.original_text:
An important event has occurred in one of your protectorate's colonies which calls for the Rogue Trader's personal attention.
You can visit the colony and complete the event at any time. You can find out more information about all current events demanding your involvement on the colony management screen [{bind|OpenColonyManagement}].

traits.locale_text:
In einer der Kolonien deines Protektorats ist ein wichtiges Ereignis eingetreten, das die persönliche Aufmerksamkeit des Freihändlers erfordert.
Du kannst die Kolonie jederzeit besuchen und das Ereignis abschließen. Weitere Informationen zu allen aktuellen Ereignissen, die deine Beteiligung erfordern, findest du im Kolonieverwaltungsbildschirm [{bind|OpenColonyManagement}].

languages.text:
Un événement important s'est produit dans l'une des colonies de votre protectorat et requiert l'attention personnelle du libre-marchand.
Vous pouvez rejoindre la colonie et terminer l'événement à tout moment. Vous trouverez de plus amples informations sur tous les événements nécessitant votre intervention sur l'écran de gestion des colonies [{bind|OpenColonyManagement}].
languages.original_text:
An important event has occurred in one of your protectorate's colonies which calls for the Rogue Trader's personal attention.
You can visit the colony and complete the event at any time. You can find out more information about all current events demanding your involvement on the colony management screen [{bind|OpenColonyManagement}].

traits.locale_text:
Un événement important s'est produit dans l'une des colonies de votre protectorat et requiert l'attention personnelle du Libre-Marchand.
Vous pouvez rejoindre la colonie et terminer l'événement à tout moment. Vous trouverez de plus amples informations sur tous les événements en cours nécessitant votre intervention sur l'écran de gestion des colonies [{bind|OpenColonyManagement}].

languages.text:
Protektoranın kolonilerinden birinde Hür Tacir'in bizzat ilgilenmesini gerektiren önemli bir olay meydana geldi.
İstediğin zaman koloniye uğrayıp olayı çözebilirsin. Koloni yönetimi ekranında [{bind|OpenColonyManagement}], müdahale etmeni gerektiren tüm güncel olaylar hakkında bilgi bulabilirsin.
languages.original_text:
An important event has occurred in one of your protectorate's colonies which calls for the Rogue Trader's personal attention.
You can visit the colony and complete the event at any time. You can find out more information about all current events demanding your involvement on the colony management screen [{bind|OpenColonyManagement}].
